title: Atmosphere (Kaskade album)
text:
Atmosphere is the eighth studio album of American <a href="house%20music">house</a> DJ and <a href="electronic%20dance%20music">electronic dance music</a> producer <a href="Kaskade">Kaskade</a>. It was released in the United States and Canada on September 10, 2013, through <a href="Ultra%20Records">Ultra Records</a>.
Reception.
The album shares similar success with his previous studio album "<a href="Fire%20%26amp%3B%20Ice%20%28Kaskade%20album%29">Fire & Ice</a>". It became Kaskade's second No. 1 on the <a href="Billboard%20%28magazine%29">Billboard</a> <a href="Dance/Electronic%20Albums">Dance/Electronic Albums</a> chart. It also made its debut at No. 16 on the Billboard <a href="Billboard%20200">Top 200</a> chart, as well as number 7 on the Billboard <a href="Billboard%20charts%23Albums">Digital Albums</a> chart and number 2 on the Billboard <a href="Billboard%20charts%23Albums">Independent Albums</a> chart. "Atmosphere" earned Kaskade his second <a href="Grammy%20Award">Grammy</a> nomination for <a href="Grammy%20Award%20for%20Best%20Dance/Electronica%20Album">Best Dance/Electronica Album</a> in 2014.
The album received mixed reviews from mainstream critics. <a href="Metacritic">Metacritic</a> rated "Atmosphere" an average score of 62 out of 100 based on 5 reviews, indicating "generally positive reviews".
Credits and personnel.
Credits adapted from <a href="AllMusic">AllMusic</a> and <a href="Discogs">Discogs</a>.
